snippet: Israel is conducting a nationwide vaccination drive, trying to give a million children under age 10 drops containing a live vaccine.
abstract: Israel's Health Ministry announces that polio virus has been found in Jerusalem's sewers for the first time since the country eliminated the disease; no children are known to have been paralyzed by the disease.
lead_paragraph: Israel is conducting a nationwide vaccination drive, trying to give a million children under age 10 drops containing a live vaccine.

headline.main: Polio Virus Found in Jerusalem’s Sewers
headline.print_headline: Israel: Polio Virus Found in Jerusalem
